The movie is known for its inspiring and emotional plot, as well as its memorable characters and iconic training montage.

Alternatively, if you're in the mood for something a bit more psychological and mysterious, "The Number 23" (2007) might be up your alley. Starring Jim Carrey as Walter Sparrow, a man who becomes obsessed with a novel that he believes was written about him, the film explores themes of identity and paranoia in a unique and captivating way. With a talented cast and an intriguing plot, this movie is sure to keep you on the edge of your seat.
